## Data Sources

### Primary Data

**Happiness Points**
Collected via survey from Drexel University students as part of urban experience research. Students identified locations in Philadelphia that evoked feelings of happiness.

**Google Street View Imagery**
Accessed via Google Street View API. Panoramic images (3328 × 1664 pixels) downloaded using tile-based retrieval method at zoom level 3.

- Google. (2024). Street View Static API. [https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/streetview](https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/streetview)

**U.S. Census Bureau American Community Survey**
5-year estimates (2018-2022) at census tract level for Philadelphia County.

- U.S. Census Bureau. (2023). American Community Survey 5-Year Data (2018-2022). [https://www.census.gov/programs-surveys/acs](https://www.census.gov/programs-surveys/acs)

**Philadelphia Road Network**
OpenDataPhilly street centerlines dataset.

- City of Philadelphia. (2024). Street Centerlines. [https://opendataphilly.org/datasets/street-centerlines/](https://opendataphilly.org/datasets/street-centerlines/)

## Methods & Models

### Semantic Segmentation

**SegFormer**
Xie, E., Wang, W., Yu, Z., Anandkumar, A., Alvarez, J. M., & Luo, P. (2021). SegFormer: Simple and efficient design for semantic segmentation with transformers. *Advances in Neural Information Processing Systems*, 34, 12077-12090.

- Model: nvidia/segformer-b0-finetuned-ade-512-512
- Hugging Face: [https://huggingface.co/nvidia/segformer-b0-finetuned-ade-512-512](https://huggingface.co/nvidia/segformer-b0-finetuned-ade-512-512)

**ADE20K Dataset**
Zhou, B., Zhao, H., Puig, X., Fidler, S., Barriuso, A., & Torralba, A. (2017). Scene parsing through ADE20K dataset. *Proceedings of the IEEE Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition*, 633-641.

### Positive-Unlabeled Learning

Bekker, J., & Davis, J. (2020). Learning from positive and unlabeled data: A survey. *Machine Learning*, 109(4), 719-760.

Elkan, C., & Noto, K. (2008). Learning classifiers from only positive and unlabeled data. *Proceedings of the 14th ACM SIGKDD International Conference on Knowledge Discovery and Data Mining*, 213-220.
